Post.title: HPA
Post.author: zhaojizhuang
Post._content:
## HPA

HPA, Pod Horizontal Pod Autoscaler CPU replication controllerdeployment replica set  pod  CPU  custom metrics pod  DaemonSets

Pod  Kubernetes API   CPU  replication controller  deployment 

> [](https://kubernetes.io/zh/docs/tasks/run-application/horizontal-pod-autoscale/#pod-%e6%b0%b4%e5%b9%b3%e8%87%aa%e5%8a%a8%e4%bc%b8%e7%bc%a9%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c%e6%9c%ba%e5%88%b6) 

**HPA **

 HPA  baxiaoshi [https://www.yuque.com/baxiaoshi/tyado3/yw9deb](https://www.yuque.com/baxiaoshi/tyado3/yw9deb),hpa

`HPA`  `hpacontroller` ,   `--horizontal-pod-autoscaler-sync-period`  15


HPA

```yaml
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2beta2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: php-apache
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: php-apache
  minReplicas: 1
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 50
status:
  observedGeneration: 1
  lastScaleTime: <some-time>
  currentReplicas: 1
  desiredReplicas: 1
  currentMetrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      current:
        averageUtilization: 0
        averageValue: 0

```


## 

 `HPA`  `HPA` ,  `Horizontal Pod Autoscaler`  ** ** **

`--horizontal-pod-autoscaler-downscale-stabilization: `  `kube-controller-manager`  5(5m0s)`





- web
- 
- 

31.17 `issue`
- [https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/39090](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/39090)
- [https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/65097](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/65097)
- [https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/69428](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/69428)

 `1.18` `HPA`   [keps](https://github.com/kubernetes/enhancements/blob/master/keps/sig-autoscaling/20190307-configurable-scale-velocity-for-hpa.md)

## 

 `hpa`  `behavior`

```yaml
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2beta2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: php-apache
spec:
  ***
  behavior:
      scaleUp:
        policies:
        - type: percent
          value: 900%
      scaleDown:
        policies:
        - type: pods
          value: 1
          periodSeconds: 600 # (i.e., scale down one pod every 10 min)
  metrics:
    ***
```

 `behavior`   

- `scaleUp` 
    - `stabilizationWindowSeconds` - `HPA` 
    - `selectPolicy``min``max`, `policies`  `max`
    - `policies` 
        - `type` `pods``percent`Pod
        - `periodSeconds` 
        - `value`: 0  
- `scaleDown`  `scaleUp` 

 HPAHPA

`selectPolicy` max**** 

## 

### 1

> 

HPA

```yaml
behavior:
  scaleUp:
    policies:
    - type: percent
      value: 900%
```
`900%` 910

pod1 pod

`1 -> 10 -> 100 -> 1000`

scaleDown [](https://v1-14.docs.kubernetes.io/zh/docs/tasks/run-application/horizontal-pod-autoscale/#%E7%AE%97%E6%B3%95%E7%BB%86%E8%8A%82) 

### 2

> 

HPA

```yaml
behavior:
  scaleUp:
    policies:
    - type: percent
      value: 900%
  scaleDown:
    policies:
    - type: pods
      value: 1
      periodSeconds: 600 # (i.e., 10pod)
```
 110pod

1000podpod

`1000 -> 1000 -> 1000 ->  (7 more min) -> 999`

### 3

> 

HPA

```yaml
behavior:
  scaleUp:
    policies:
    - type: pods
      value: 1
```

pod1 pod

`1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4`

scaleDown [](https://v1-14.docs.kubernetes.io/zh/docs/tasks/run-application/horizontal-pod-autoscale/#%E7%AE%97%E6%B3%95%E7%BB%86%E8%8A%82) 

### 4 

>  

HPA

```yaml
behavior:
  scaleDown:
    policies:
    - type: pods
      value: 0
```



### 5

>  

```yaml
behavior:
  scaleDown:
    stabilizationWindowSeconds: 600
    policies:
    - type: pods
      value: 5
```
 `hpa` 

-  `600s` 300s
- 
- 5pod

 `CurReplicas = 10` , `HPA controller`  `1min` :

-  9 min,  
    `recommendations = [10, 9, 8, 9, 9, 8, 9, 8, 9]`
-  10 min `8`
    `recommendations = [10, 9, 8, 9, 9, 8, 9, 8, 98]`
    HPA  `10``repicas` 
-  11 min `7` `600s`  `10` 
    `recommendations = [9, 8, 9, 9, 8, 9, 8, 9, 8, 7]`
    HPA  `9`,  `10 -> 9`
    
### 6 

> 

HPA

```yaml
behavior:
  scaleUp:
    stabilizationWindowSeconds: 300
    policies:
    - type: pods
      value: 20
```

 `hpa` 

-  `300s` 0s
- 
- 20pod

 `CurReplicas = 2` , `HPA controller`  `1min` :

-  5 min,  
    `recommendations = [2, 3, 19, 10, 3]`
-  6 min `4`
    `recommendations = [2, 3, 19, 10, 3, 4]`
    HPA  `2``repicas` 
-  11 min `7` `300s`  `2` 
    `recommendations = [3, 19, 10, 3, 47]`
    HPA  `3`,  `2 -> 3`

## 



```go
//  HPA controller for
for {
    desiredReplicas = AnyAlgorithmInHPAController(...)
    
    // 
    if desiredReplicas > curReplicas {
      replicas = []int{}
      for _, policy := range behavior.ScaleUp.Policies {
        if policy.type == "pods" {
          replicas = append(replicas, CurReplicas + policy.Value)
        } else if policy.type == "percent" {
          replicas = append(replicas, CurReplicas * (1 + policy.Value/100))
        }
      }
      if behavior.ScaleUp.selectPolicy == "max" {
        scaleUpLimit = max(replicas)
      } else {
        scaleUpLimit = min(replicas)
      }
      // min 
      limitedReplicas = min(max, desiredReplicas)
    }
    // 
    if desiredReplicas < curReplicas {
      for _, policy := range behaviro.scaleDown.Policies {
        replicas = []int{}
        if policy.type == "pods" {
          replicas = append(replicas, CurReplicas - policy.Value)
        } else if policy.type == "percent" {
          replicas = append(replicas, CurReplicas * (1 - policy.Value /100))
        }
        if behavior.ScaleDown.SelectPolicy == "max" {
          scaleDownLimit = min(replicas)
        } else {
          scaleDownLimit = max(replicas)
        }
        // max 
        limitedReplicas = max(min, desiredReplicas)
      }
    }
    storeRecommend(limitedReplicas, scaleRecommendations)
    // 
    nextReplicas := applyRecommendationIfNeeded(scaleRecommendations)
    // 
    setReplicas(nextReplicas)
    sleep(ControllerSleepTime)
  }
```

## 


`behavior` 

- behavior.scaleDown.stabilizationWindowSeconds = 300,  5 min.
- behavior.scaleUp.stabilizationWindowSeconds = 0, 
- behavior.scaleUp.policies 
    - 
        - policy = `percent`
        - periodSeconds = `60`,  1min
        - value = `100` 
    - Pod
        - policy = `pods`
        - periodSeconds = `60`,  1min
        - value = `4` 4
- behavior.scaleDown.policies 
    - 
        - policy = `percent`
        - periodSeconds = `60`  1min
        - value = `100`

## interface 

1.  `interface`
```go
type eface struct { // 16 bytes
	_type *_type
	data  unsafe.Pointer
}
```

}

||||
|----|----|----|

```go
type Duck interface {
	Quack()
}

type Cat struct{}

func (c *Cat) Quack() {
	fmt.Println("meow")
}

func main() {
	var c Duck = Cat{}  // 
	c.Quack()
}

$ go build interface.go
./interface.go:20:6: cannot use Cat literal (type Cat) as type Duck in assignment:
	Cat does not implement Duck (Quack method has pointer receiver)
```

Go c.Quack() ****

-  &Cat{}  &Cat{} dereference
-  Cat{}  Quack  Cat{}*Cat

	go func() {

}

$ go run main.go
in goroutine
panic:

## map

### map 

```go
type hmap struct {
    count     int    // 
    flags     uint8  // 
    B         uint8  //  6.5 * 2 ^ B 6.5
    noverflow uint16 // 
    hash0     uint32 // 

    buckets    unsafe.Pointer // 
    oldbuckets unsafe.Pointer // 
    nevacuate  uintptr        // nevacuate
    overflow *[2]*[]*bmap 
}
// A bucket for a Go map.
type bmap struct {
    // hash8tophash[0] < minTopHash
    tophash [bucketCnt]uint8
    // bucketCnt8,8key8valuegokeyvalue
8k8v
    // hash
}
```
bmaptophash overflow setoverflow

```go
func (b *bmap) overflow(t *maptype) *bmap {
	return *(**bmap)(add(unsafe.Pointer(b), uintptr(t.bucketsize)-sys.PtrSize))
}

func (b *bmap) setoverflow(t *maptype, ovf *bmap) {
	*(**bmap)(add(unsafe.Pointer(b), uintptr(t.bucketsize)-sys.PtrSize)) = ovf
}
```
